Articles.Content:
Rules

Regular Forum Rules Apply

How to play

Someone makes a rocket, Example: Name: GFASK-12 Speed: 200 Rover(s): 0 Failed Tests: 20 Reliability: 1 Landings: Jool, Eve.

Then someone has to say, Add more Boosters! Then the above person's rocket (The one being add more boostered) Will have to have boosters added, Then the boosters will destroy it Once Destroyed, The user who added more boosters has to put in their post a new rocket, Then rinse and repeat.

I'll start

GFORCE-12 Speed: 200 Rover(s): 2 Landings: Mun, Minmus. Reliability: 30 Failed Tests: 20

Seems like a nice game; perhaps instead of a line of text, we use a real .craft file that we pass around, then take pictures of it failing due to the boosters?

Just an idea.
this is totally random, but well this own to add some boosteherhim ^^ us us ally ^^
